content:

### Investigator Notes
- EDC data entry backlog cleared, queries resolved
- Study drug accountability reconciled, no discrepancies
- Regulatory binder audit: all documents current
- 10 of 12 sites have implemented protocol amendment; 2 sites pending local IRB

### Events
- Medical monitor weekly call completed
- Bioanalytical lab shipment tracking confirmed for 4 samples
- IVRS system update deployed, randomization unaffected
- Site implementation tracking: 10/12 sites active on amended protocol

### Notes
- Week 28: Amended protocol in effect at majority of sites. Hepatic monitoring frequency adjusted.
